tasks.title: Set up GitHub PAT for tracker task sync
tasks.description:
1. Go to GitHub > Settings > Developer Settings > Personal Access Tokens > Fine-grained
2. Create token scoped to gavinhmacphee/ysm-tracker with Contents read/write
3. Build link: https://ysm-tracker.vercel.app?token=github_pat_YOUR_TOKEN
4. Text it to yourself, open once on phone
5. Token saves automatically, URL cleans itself up
6. Test by adding a task from phone and checking the repo

tasks.title: Create frontend preview of Kids Soccer Directory
tasks.description: We have lots of data in the system now - lets see what the directory will look like
